name: I am stress
description:
the yellow man that i animated was me

here is these video:

i was not feeling good i am dressed up with badly with no smile

and for stickman figure

i am a mess in midnight i was doing some drawing and send it to my group member but my group member told me that my drawing is weird and oneday another Midnight i was doing drawing in my laptop in midnight then suddenly i got a message i am dumb then i get very sad and play this animation for you

I hope i feel better ;(
